data.description: With this setting you can control the amount of overlap between the infill and walls, which can be set as a percentage. The default value in Ultimaker Cura will be sufficient overlap for most cases.
data.img_description: A visualisation of the infill overlap and wipe distance.
data.hints: - A higher value usually results in better bonding between the infill and walls. However, it might also reduce the visual quality of the print, as a value that is too high could lead to over extrusion.
data.notes: Note: If a high value is set, the infill will show through the walls in the final print result.
